h2_title: Where to Find the Mother of Stones
content: This boss battle is an interesting one, simply because the giant crystal-embedded statue known as the Mother of Stones doesn’t actually fight you. It doesn’t really move at all, but it has a lot of health to slowly chip through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Stones.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Stones', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Mother of Stones' and the sub-subsection 'Mother of Stones Boss Fight'.
The content is as follows:
This boss battle is an interesting one, simply because the giant crystal-embedded statue known as the Mother of Stones doesn’t actually fight you. It doesn’t really move at all, but it has a lot of health to slowly chip through.
